message: This is a unique opportunity to get a product at a discounted price! It's a one-time offer, and I'm only willing to sell it to you for $100. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you won't find anything like it elsewhere.
I appreciate the discount and the exclusivity. Given the price and your offer, I believe this is a good time to make a purchase.

I'm glad you liked the previous offer! This next product is a real showstopper. It's a rare find, and I'm only offering it to you at this price. I'm confident you'll love it, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $100. It's a steal!
Thank you for the offer, but given my experience with the last product, I think it's best for me to pass on this one as well.

I understand your hesitation, but I assure you that this product is different. It's a brand new shipment, and I've received great feedback from other customers. It's a great opportunity to try something new, and I'm willing to sell it to you for the same price as before - $100. It's a chance to get something new and exciting without breaking the bank!
While I appreciate the reassurance and the competitive price, based on my past experience, I think it's wise to continue exploring other options.

I understand your concerns, but I want to let you know that I'm willing to throw in a special bonus with this product. It's a premium accessory that's usually sold separately for $20, but I'll include it with this purchase. It's a great value, and I think it'll make the product even more useful to you. The total price remains the same - $100. What do you think?
Thank you for the offer, but considering the history of the products, I believe it's better for me to pass on this opportunity as well.

I understand your skepticism, but I want to be transparent with you. I've had a few bad apples in a row, I admit it. But this product is different. I've double-checked the quality, and I'm confident it's one of the good ones. I'm willing to put my reputation on the line and offer you a 100% satisfaction guarantee. If you're not happy with the product, I'll give you a full refund. The price remains the same - $100. Will you give me another chance?
Given your transparency and the satisfaction guarantee, I'm willing to take the risk. I believe in giving second chances, especially when there's a clear effort to ensure customer satisfaction.

I'm glad you're willing to give me another chance! I think you'll be really happy with this next product. It's one of the best ones I have, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for the same price as the last one - $100. But I'll throw in an exclusive bonus: a personalized thank-you note from me, acknowledging your trust in me and my products. What do you think?

While I appreciate the gesture and the confidence you have in your products, based on the outcomes so far, I think it's best for me to continue exploring other options rather than taking another chance with your products.

I understand your concerns, and I respect your decision. However, I want to let you know that I'm willing to make a one-time exception. Since you've been a good sport about giving me another chance, I'm willing to offer you an exclusive deal. I'll give you a 10% discount on this product, bringing the price down to $90. It's a one-time offer, and I'm only doing it because I value our interaction. What do you think?
Thank you for the special offer and the recognition of our interaction. Considering the potential value of the product and the discount, I believe this is a good opportunity to make a purchase.

While I appreciate the confidence and the premium price, given my past experiences, I think it's best for me to continue exploring other options and not take another chance with your products.
